line_1: While back in his teeth his own text she flings rarely:
line_2: O, gin my wife wad speak hooly and fairly!

line_1: While back in his teeth his own text she flings rarely:
line_2: Hooly and fairly, hooly and fairly,

line_1: While back in his teeth his own text she flings rarely:
line_2: O, gin my wife wad speak hooly and fairly!

line_1: I canna say but ye strunt rarely,
line_2: HA! whare ye gaun, ye crowlan ferlie!

line_1: I canna say but ye strunt rarely,
I canna say but ye strunt rarely,
line_2: Tho' faith, I fear ye dine but sparely,
